name: Ludum and the Lost Pages
description:
A puzzle platformer about a wizard regaining his former power.

Play through 8 levels of increasing difficulty. Start from nothing (not even the clothes on your back) and make your way through a vast forgotten library. Find tomes of power that will help you once again become a powerful wizard and escape!

Use WASD to move and jump
Use the ARROW KEYS to perform spells after you obtain them

-Down arrow - Fireball - Fire a projectile that destroys boxes and enemies
-Up arrow - Magic Leap - Jump higher
-Left arrow - Stone Skin - Protect yourself from damaging spikes and enemies
-Right arrow - Teleport - Blink yourself in the direction you are facing
